title: Permenant Ban when client loaded??
body: I am able to sign into the website just fine but after I just loaded the client it said I was permanently banned. Was curious if this happened to anyone else.

replies.body: It looks like we proactively locked your account as a security precaution.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account recovery team will help!  We'll want to make sure it goes back to the owner's hands!
I also never received an email on why it was banned
